Biography
====================================================================================

<img src="pictures/profilePic1.jpg" style="width:25%; border:2px solid; margin-right: 20px" align="left">


I graduated from the [University of California, Irvine](https://www.stat.uci.edu/) with a Ph.D. in statistics in 2018. 
Then I joined Merck Research Laboratory as postdoctoral fellow. I am currently an Assistant Professor in the Department of Statistics at Western Michigan University. My research interests include Bayesian analysis, clustering, time series, spectral analysis, and functional data analysis. 
I am also working on statistical modeling and machine learning for subgroup identification/analysis for benefit--risk assessment.
